a.span: Student Promotion and Retention and Student Pass/Failure of a Course
Reading Sufficiency Act Testing and Procedures

div.p:
April 16, 2020
Good Evening,
Continuous Learning Plan – Students should have received assignments for the remainder of the school year, which ends May 8th. If you have not received your assignments please contact your school site.
Returning work – Please take pictures and email, text, or dojo to staff when assignments are complete. Staff emails are on our website. If you have questions or need help please . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Distance Learning Update 4/16/2020

div.p:
April 9, 2020
Good Evening,
Continuous Learning Plan – We have released Parent Guides on our website, www.hilldale.k12.us , and social media platform. (Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter) If you do not have access to either of those platforms please contact your student’s school site. We can email or snail mail you the Parent Guide.
April 13th – By April 13, assignments from . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Distance Learning Update 4/9/2020

div.p: Hilldale will implement our distance learning plan beginning Monday, April 6. For more information, please view this slide show .

div.p:
The Hilldale Board of Education will conduct a special meeting on April 13, 2020, at 5:00 p.m. This meeting will be conducted entirely via teleconferencing and videoconferencing.

div.p:
March 27, 2020
Good Evening,
Child Nutrition: Our staff has served over 4000 meals this week. I can’t tell you how appreciative we are to have such great support staff. Starting Monday, March 30, our staff will be providing breakfast with a hot lunch at our elementary site. We will serve from 10:30 to 12:30. We will continue to serve a cold lunch and breakfast at our Eastside Community Church location from 10:30 to . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about School Closing Update 3/27/2020

div.p:
March 25, 2020
Good Evening,
Will school be closed the remainder of the year? Today the Oklahoma State School Board voted to keep school buildings closed for the remainder of the school year. Schools have been given orders to make “continuous learning plans.” We will release information for staff and students soon.
Activities – As of today, all school activities are cancelled. Schools . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about School Closing Update 3/25/2020
